channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL

item.title: Report E-2024090465
item.description:
Report E-2024090465

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-23T09:15:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-30
  • City: BESSEMER
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 05:24 EST on 8/30, XPO-NBM contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 1 cup of UN1133 "WELD-ON 721" from a 1gallon metal pail impacting the dock floor. The pail was punctured by a forklift at NMP. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable cleaning the spill with terminal-issued PPE. The damaged pail and clean up debris were containerized into a 20-gallon poly drum, which was staged on site for terminal personnel to manage.

  • Description: Driver discovered leake while performing load check at rest area. Driver contained spill and contacted emergency operation center. Emergency response team was dispatched to clean the spill and place unit back on service. Container was overpacked for further transportation.
